newsitem.title: USA: Talley Industries Inc Q3 net rises.
newsitem.headline: Talley Industries Inc Q3 net rises.

text.p: Three Months Ended Nine Months Ended
(a) Revenue and earnings include impact of the $156.5 million payments received in connection with the recently concluded litigation with TRW Inc.

(b) Earnings before income taxes and extraordinary gains for the nine months ended Sept. 30, 1996 and 1995 include a provision for a real estate reserve of $85.0 million, resulting from a determination that a bulk sale and/or joint venture development arrangement for real estate assets should be undertaken. Earnings for 1995 includes a provision for a real estate reserve of $7.0 million.
(c) The extraordinary gain for the three months and nine months ended Sept. 30, 1995 is the result of the retirement of real estate debt for less than book value.

(d) Amount does not impact net earnings of the company but represents the estimated value of additional shares issued to induce conversion and is supplementally disclosed as a reduction of amounts available to common shareholders, pursuant to SEC rules.
